name: How To Convert Pdf To Pdf/A Online for Free
description:
Convert PDF to a specific PDF/A ISO conformance level
In this video, you will learn how to convert a PDF file to PDF/A in a few minutes

step.text: To convert a PDF file to PDF/A format , first Upload the document that you want to archive for a long term preservation, click or drag and drop your PDF on the “Choose file” box inPDF to PDF/A converter tool.
step.name: Choose File

step.text: Select your preferred PDF/A standard: PDF/A-1A, PDF/A-1B, PDF/A-2A,PDF/A-2B, PDF/A-3A, PDF/A-3B, PDF/A-2U, PDF/A-3U and Click on the
button and wait a few moments to to convert a PDF to a PDF.A file
step.name: File converted successfully

step.text: Converting a PDF to a PDF/A file is processed over the Internet You can Download the PDF/A file to your device or scan QR code on your Phone. also send the PDF file to others by email or by sending a download link.
step.name: Download
